snippet: Lindsey Vonn’s surgically repaired right knee feels so good that she could be racing again by the end of the month, five weeks earlier than she expected, she said.
abstract: Lindsey Vonn announces that her surgically repaired right knee feels good enough that she could be racing earlier than expected.
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn’s surgically repaired right knee feels so good that she could be racing again by the end of the month, five weeks earlier than she expected, she said.
